title: People need to stop misleading new players
body: From an early league age we are always told, no matter who you are you should focus the carries. Eventually people get to level 30 and decide to play ranked with that idea in their head. They then cause everybody heartache because they play ADC's and APC and decide to go to the frontline to kill the enemy adc/apc. People need to stop spreading this shit as only the assassin class or maybe the bruisers should be killing the enemy adc/apc. you freaking job as a support is to peel for your team aka adc / apc not to disregard your adc/apc and go try to cc theirs.

replies.body: Upvoted because Anivia is my favourite champ. Foggen approves.

Also as an ADC, especially a short range one, you get so much flak for attacking the tank because hes the only one in range you can safely attack. If you were to get into auto range of the enemy ADC, you would be standing on top of their darius.
